name: portal-wholesale
title: Portal Wholesale
description: Search and manage Portal Wholesale brands
author: nickdichev

commands.name: search-portal-wholesale-brands
commands.title: Search Brands
commands.description: Search Portal Wholesale brands by name or website URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did not intend to do this, make sure you are in a folder where you intended to publish to npm.

If you did intend to publish this package to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.

" && exit 1
